com.hcl.voltmx.middleware.controller

Interface DataControllerRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable

    public interface DataControllerRequest
extends Cloneable
    An abstraction over actual client request.
    See Also:
    DataControllerResponse

    • Method Detail

      • updateOriginalRequest

        void updateOriginalRequest(Map<String,Object> map)

        FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY.

        Updates the original underlying request object.
        Parameters:
        map - The map

      • getParameter

        String getParameter(String name)
        Gets the request parameter passed in as post parameter or query string. If the parameter has multiple values, this method will return the first value. The returned value will be URL decoded.
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        Returns:
        URL decoded parameter value if parameter exists, null otherwise.
        See Also:
        getParameterValues(String)

      • getParameterValues

        String[] getParameterValues(String name)
        Gets the request parameter passed in as post parameter or query string. This method returns all the values for the given parameter as String array. The returned values will be URL decoded.
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        Returns:
        URL decoded parameter values if parameter exists, null otherwise.
        See Also:
        getParameter(String)

      • getAttribute

        <T> T getAttribute(String name)
        Gets an attribute value, an Object previously stored in the scope of this request.
        Parameters:
        name - The attribute name
        Returns:
        The attribute value

      • setAttribute

        <T> void setAttribute(String name,
                      T value)
        Sets an attribute value, an Object storied in the scope of this request.
        Parameters:
        name - The attribute name
        value - The attribute value

      • getAttributeNames

        Iterator<String> getAttributeNames()
        Gets name of all the attributes stored in the scope of this request.
        Returns:
        Name of all attributes

      • getParameterNames

        Iterator<String> getParameterNames()
        Gets name of all the request parameters.
        Returns:
        Name of all the request parameters

      • getUploadedFileNames

        String[] getUploadedFileNames()
        Gets name of all the files that have been received in this request.
        Returns:
        Name of all the files

      • getUploadedFile

        File getUploadedFile(String name)
        Gets the specified file that was uploaded.
        Parameters:
        name - The file name as in Content-Disposition header of the request
        Returns:
        The uploaded file

      • getUploadedFiles

        File[] getUploadedFiles()
        Gets all the uploaded files.
        Returns:
        All the uploaded files

      • getSession

        Session getSession()
        Gets the session associated with the request. Creates new session if one is not created.
        Returns:
        The associated session
        See Also:
        Session

      • getSession

        Session getSession(boolean createNewIfNotExist)
        Gets the session associated with the request. Creates new session if the flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        createNewIfNotExist - If true, a new session is created and associated with this request if there is no associated session
        Returns:
        The associated session
        See Also:
        Session

      • setSession

        void setSession(Session session)
        Sets a session for this request.
        Parameters:
        session - The session to set
        See Also:
        Session

      • containsKeyInRequestContext

        boolean containsKeyInRequestContext(String name)
        Gets whether an attribute (an Object scoped to this request) exists or not.
        Parameters:
        name - The attribute name
        Returns:
        True if the attribute with given name exists, false otherwise
        See Also:
        getAttribute(String), setAttribute(String, Object)

      • containsKeyInRequest

        boolean containsKeyInRequest(String name)
        Gets whether a parameter exists or not.
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        Returns:
        True if the parameter with given name exists, false otherwise
        See Also:
        getParameter(String)

      • getSource

        Map<String,String[]> getSource()
        Gets a map of parameter key and parameter values.
        Returns:
        An immutable map containing parameter names and parameter values as keys of type String and values of type String[] of the map.

      • getOriginalRequest

        @Deprecated
Object getOriginalRequest()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the actual underlying request object. It is recommended to operate on this wrapper object instead of doing any direct operation on the underlying object.
        Returns:
        The actual underlying request object
